N = int(input())
for i in range(1, N + 1):
    A = list(map(int, input().split()))
    P1 = A[0]
    P2 = A[1]
    if P1 > P2:
        B = P1
    else:
        B = P2
    C = P1 + P2
    print(str(B) + ' ' + str(C))
